16898365292.alt:
The Luz Station is a railway station in the city of São Paulo, Brazil. 
The station was built in the late 19th century with the purpose of being the headquarters of the newly founded São Paulo Railway.
Nowadays, it is part of the metropolitan rail system run by CPTM. 
It is also notable for housing the Museum of the Portuguese Language, established in 2006.

16279609393.alt:
The Luz Station is a railway station in the city of São Paulo, Brazil. 
The station was built in the late 19th century with the purpose of being the headquarters of the newly founded São Paulo Railway.
Nowadays, it is part of the metropolitan rail system run by CPTM.

16268485203.alt: Municipal Theatre of São Paulo is regarded as one of the landmarks of the city, significant both for its architectural value as well as for its historical importance. The building now houses the São Paulo Municipal Symphonic Orchestra, the Lyric Choir and the City Ballet of São Paulo.

16269042503.alt: O Pavilhão Lucas Nogueira Garcez, popularmente conhecido como Oca, é um pavilhão de exposições localizado no Parque do Ibirapuera. Foi projetado por Oscar Niemeyer em 1951 e construído em 1954.
